title: Understanding Anxiety Medications
text: Anxiety disorders are often treated with medications that help manage symptoms. These medications can include certain types of antidepressants, anxiolytics, and other specific drugs.

title: Types of Antidepressants
text: Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) and serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs) are commonly used antidepressants for treating anxiety disorders.

title: Role of Benzodiazepines
text: Benzodiazepines are a class of drugs primarily used for treating anxiety. They work quickly to relieve symptoms but are generally prescribed for short-term use due to the risk of dependence.

hintAnswer: benzodiazepines, buspirone, and antidepressants, specifically SSRIs and SNRIs
title: Identifying Common Anxiety Medications
text: Based on the information provided, which of the following combinations includes commonly prescribed medications for anxiety?
choices: antipsychotics, antidepressants, mood stabilizers, anxiolytics, hypnotics, and stimulants
benzodiazepines, buspirone, and antidepressants, specifically SSRIs and SNRIs
